name: Rapid Ghost
description:
Rapid Ghost is a 2.5D-Side-scroller, one button, adventure game. This game is inspired by old school Mario, MediEvil and a lot of little indie game projects ive seen recently.

You play as a ghost, who has recently died so you are learning the ropes on how to be dead, your goal will be possessing exorcists trespassing on dead man territory. You need to do this so you can travel further away from your gravesite.
